scripts.test: yarn newman run 'DISI MVP.postman_collection.json' --folder 'MPI interactions' --folder 'Submit CBS events bundle'
scripts.test:1000: yarn newman run 'DISI MVP.postman_collection.json' --folder 'All events, random patient' -n 1000 --delay-request 1000
scripts.test:abuse: yarn newman run 'DISI MVP.postman_collection.json' --folder 'All events, random patient' -n 1000
scripts.test:abuse-x4: yarn concurrently "yarn test:abuse" "yarn test:abuse" "yarn test:abuse" "yarn test:abuse"
